name: YouTube Nocturnal
description:
Dark version of YouTube...Widened it, which can be changed...Bigger video player; wider comments area...Some hover effects; not much, but enough to not be so plain...Lot here so could have missed something...Shout whether you like/dislike...Check my profile for dark Newzbin, IMDB, RUWT, ESPN Fantasy Games...

Haven't had time to update much...Still have some to do but a small update until I get more time...

** 5/9/10 -- Small Update for Viewing Videos **

** Updated Little Bit After YouTube's wonderful change of code -- Yet Again  4/1/10 -- More To Come as Not Quite Finished **

Comments/Suggestions Welcomed...A lot of the old code worked but what had to be changed is still WIP...

BEFORE: http://i663.photobucket.com/albums/uu355/konphlikt/yt1.png

AFTER:  http://i663.photobucket.com/albums/uu355/konphlikt/yt2.png
